abstract_ssm: This collection contains handwritten copies of Purcell Robertson's manuscripts, Profiles of the Early Settlers of Brookhaven, circa 1655-1680 and Profiles of the Early Freeholders of Hempstead, 1647. Both of these towns are located on Long Island, N.Y. The manuscripts were written in 1982 and 1983.
